answerText: Song of Solomon[10] This author of Song of Solomon also wrote a novel in which Claudia MacTeer narrates the life of her friend Pecola Breedlove, who wishes to attain the title Bluest Eye.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 4 | 6 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of this novel received his nickname because his mother nursed him for six years. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which that protagonist learns his family history in Shalimar, Virginia while searching for gold his aunt Pilate had convinced his father Macon not to steal.
